Uses of Class
Power

  • Uses of Power in Unnamed Package

    Subclasses of Power in Unnamed Package
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Bomb
    A class that kills all rats standing on the tile at the time of explosion - (5 game ticks after it's been placed).
    class 
    FemaleSwapper
    A class that swaps male rat to female if it steps on this Power.
    class 
    Gas
    A class that deals damage to Rats that step over this Power.
    class 
    MaleSwapper
    A class that swaps female rat to male if it steps on this Power.
    class 
    Poison
    A class that kills rats that step on this Power.
    class 
    Sterilisation
    A class that makes rat's sterile once they step on this Power.
    class 
    StopSign
    A class that acts as an unpassable tile for Rat, activating 5 times before disappearing.
